column1: The Pit Room////The wait was worth it. 5-10 minutes. The brisket melts in your mouth. The rib was very tender and flavorful. The Jalapeño cheese sausage was excellent too. Loved their potato salad
column2: corn and green beans. They had some excellent jalapeños
column4: cucumbers. Their salsa was good and homemade hot sauces was off the chain. Loved their house made mustard too. There was plenty of seating even tho they were packed. Everything I ordered was under $35 and that is a bargain compared to how much other places charge for this BBq. Definitely will be back for some more!
